name: Fish Game (Trosh)
description:
Poof!

You're a Fish now :)

Oh! Also...Don't get eaten

---------------------------------

How to Play

  • The Fish will move towards your mouse
  • Use the Space bar to apply force
  • make sure not to starve
  • Collect coins and become rich :)
Controls:EscPauseSpaceMove

---------------------------------

You can play the game here, in your Browser

(if playing in the browser, you might have to make it fullscreen for the mouse not to leave the window)

or by downloading it below

(btw this is like my first game)
